| HistoryText             = Creations of the [[Herbert Wyndham (Earth-616)|High Evolutionary]], ''They'' are twelve survivors of [[Counter-Earth (High Evolutionary)|Counter-Earth]]. They were saved by the mysterious [[Man-Beast (Earth-616)|Omega]] who made them into cyborgs and reprogrammed them into him into the embodiment of pure hatred.{{Citation}}

When confront by [[Adam Warlock (Earth-616)|Adam Warlock]] and torn between their loyalties to their creator, the High Evolutionary, and Omega's reprogramming, they overloaded their electronics and died.{{Citation}}
